dialog_delete_event_description: Are you sure you want to delete this event ?
error_no_such_email_found: No user(s) found with such e-mail
error_password_not_long_enough: Password must be at least 6 characters long
calendar_add_event_fill_people_count: Please enter a valid people count
app_info_calendar_view: To view an event in the calendar, you need to select a specific date or choose a time period in the calendar.
app_info_select_time_period: In the calendar tool, you can select a time period by choosing two dates - the start date and end date of the desired time period.
app_info_delete_event: To delete an event, the user needs to click on the button with a trash can icon, which will appear next to the event information in the calendar, if the user has the right to delete a specific event.
app_info_add_event: To add an event to the calendar, you first need to select a time period in the calendar. If the user has the right to add events, a button with a plus icon will appear in the bottom right corner of the application, and clicking on it will redirect the user to the event creation page.
app_info_change_month: To switch to another calendar month, you need to click on the arrow button at the top of the calendar, which is located on the sides of the month's name.
app_info_close_view: If the user wants to close a view, where it is possible, a left arrow will be visible in the upper left corner of the application's top menu bar, which can be pressed to close the current view.
app_info_change_password: To change the password, you need to click on the gear icon in the upper part of the page, which will take the user to the settings section. You need to click on the 'lock' section to indicate a password change.
app_info_change_language: To change the application's language, the user needs to click on the gear icon at the top of the application, which will redirect the user to the settings section, where a dropdown menu with available application languages will be visible. By selecting the desired language and clicking on it, the application's language will change.
app_info_view_history: To view the user's action history, you need to click on the 'history' icon in the top menu bar of the application, if the user has the necessary access rights to it.
app_info_title_add_event: Adding an Event to the Calendar
